content: You're welcome, Kevin! I'll make sure to keep you in the loop. If you have any other questions or need further assistance, don't hesitate to reach out. And remember, getting pre-qualified for an auto loan with Capital One is always a smart move. Thank you for considering Honda of McKinney, and have a fantastic day!
Hello! Welcome to Honda of McKinney. How may I assist you today?
That's great to hear! The Honda Civic is an excellent choice. Could you please provide me with your name and contact information so that I can assist you further?
Hello! Thank you for considering the Honda Pilot. Before we dive into the details, may I have your name and contact information, please?
